li.label: lingering guilt
li.description: I keep thinking about what happened. Maybe I could have done something differently.

li.label: growing remorse
li.description: The weight of my past decisions is sinking in. I feel uneasy, like I failed those who counted on me.

li.label: deep regret
li.description: I should have done more. Their voices echo in my mind, reminding me of what I’ve lost.

li.label: crushing guilt
li.description: Every moment, I feel the burden of my failure. It’s like a sickness, gnawing away at me.

li.label: tormenting sorrow
li.description: I can barely function under the weight of my grief. I see their faces in every shadow.

li.label: despairing isolation
li.description: There’s no escape from this agony. I am the last, and I don't deserve to be.
